Derwent demolish Goodricke

Derwent seconds brushed aside Goodricke thirds on the JLD yesterday. A brace from John Garness and a fantastic solo effort from Ryan Gwinnett sealed an impressive victory for the men in blue

Alcuin secure top spot in Group A

On a boiling hot JLD, Alucin firsts took on Halifax seconds, with Alcuin in a strong position at the top of their College Hockey Cup table

Derwent defeated in James clash

In a tense clash in Group B of the College Hockey Cup, James seconds were victorious over Derwent firsts

Boxing Club set for first exhibition night

By James Bithell

On Saturday 15 June the Boxing Club are hosting the University's first ever live exhibition sparring night

Sun debate missed the point

Jules Delay on why the Sun debate should have been about Hillsborough

College Cup fever hits campus

At a time when heads are starting to explode because of exams, the College Cup has gripped campus in a way that I never realised it would

Vanbrugh seconds edge closer to cup with gritty Derwent win

Vanbrugh seconds took a huge step towards qualification for the Cup quarter-finals after earning a hard-fought 2-1 victory over their Derwent counterparts

Wentworth storm past Goodricke with strong second half

Greg Harrison was the catalyst as Wentworth firsts recorded their first win of the 2013 College Cup with an assured second half performance to beat Goodricke thirds 6-0 after an underwhelming first half

Halifax seconds face points deduction

Halifax seconds are facing a two point deduction after failing to provide a referee at this afternoon's College Cup fixture

James continue fine form to thrash Alcuin thirds

James firsts continued their serene progress through the College Cup group stages with another high-scoring win, this time destroying Alcuin thirds 7-0

Derwent thirds stun Langwith firsts to keep cup hopes alive

Derwent thirds put in a gritty performance to pull off one of the shocks of the tournament by holding out to win 2-1 against a woeful Langwith side

Ferocious 'Fax decimate Wentworth seconds

Halifax firsts put in a commanding performance this afternoon to dispatch Wentworth seconds with true ferocity, running out 6-0 winners

James and Alcuin share spoils

James thirds and Alcuin seconds played out a 1-1 draw on the JLD this afternoon, to leave both sides level at the bottom of Group A

New York Sport Committee revealed

By James Bithell

The results of the York Sport Committee elections were released this morning

Ruthless Derwent annihilate Langwith

The scoreline didn't flatter Derwent firsts this afternoon as they thrashed Langwith thirds 7-0 on the JLD

Vanbrugh firsts grind out another win

Vanbrugh firsts maintained their three point advantage at the top of Group D with a hard-fought 2-0 win over James seconds this afternoon

Halifax thirds edge out Goodricke

Goals from Ryan Doherty and James McNeill sealed an impressive 2-1 win for Halifax thirds in what was a closely fought contest with Goodricke seconds

Dominant Vanbrugh dismantle sluggish Wentworth

An excellent first half display from Vanbrugh thirds allowed them to claim an easy victory this afternoon over an uncharacteristically lethargic Wentworth thirds side

Halifax seconds hit nine in Langwith demolition

A rampant Halifax seconds side strolled to a dominant 9-0 victory over Langwith seconds this afternoon

Poetic Goodricke see off Alcuin

An impressive display of fluid football from Goodricke firsts saw them outplay Alcuin firsts as they scored either side of half time to win 2-0 and take control of Group C

Clash between Alcuin and Halifax ends in stalemate

Goodricke firsts were the real winners in Group C yesterday as Alcuin firsts and Halifax seconds played out a 1-1 draw which was probably a fair reflection of the balance of play

Goodricke romp to victory over Vanbrugh thirds

Goodricke firsts put in an efficient performance to ruthlessly dispatch Vanbrugh thirds 3-0 in some style on the JLD

Langwith seconds claim scrappy win over Wentworth

In a game of few chances, Langwith seconds narrowly beat Wentworth thirds 2-1 on the JLD, with James MacDonald sneaking a late winner

Cust strike enough for Vanbrugh seconds

Henry Cust grabbed the only goal of the game as Vanbrugh seconds battled past Goodricke thirds in atrocious conditions on the JLD

Brutal James storm past Goodricke thirds

James firsts put on a relentless display of footballing brilliance as they hammered Goodricke thirds 12-0, with man of the match Tom Clarke claiming five goals this afternoon in a rain-drenched affair

Derwent seconds thrash Wentworth

Derwent seconds recovered in superb style from their draw last week with Alcuin seconds, as they brushed aside Wentworth firsts 5-0 amidst a downpour on the JLD

James and Derwent thirds play out draw

Derwent and James thirds played out a bad tempered draw on the JLD, which saw both teams struggle to break down the solid defences of the other

Halifax on the march as Alcuin are swept aside

Halifax firsts struggled to find top form yesterday, but maintained their perfect start to the College Cup campaign after emerging as 3-0 winners over a lacklustre Alcuin seconds side

Late Wentworth comeback not enough as Langwith win

Two goals in the last ten minutes from a tough Wentworth seconds side nearly completed a dream comeback for the postgrads, but Langwith's 3-0 lead after half-time was enough to see the Hes East side secure the win

Gill wonder goal gives James victory

Two goals from Ralph Gill ensured James 2s a 2-0 victory over Goodricke 2s on the JLD yesterday. A sensational strike from Gill in the second half sealed Goodricke's fate and gave James a well deserved win
